item.title: Guide
item.dc:creator: @u_loose u loose
item.description:
@u_loose wrote:

open up itemdef.java (client side)

look for hardcoded items
like this

} /* Hardcoded items start here */ if(i == 11207) { itemDef.stackable = false; itemDef.actions = new String[5]; itemDef.modifiedModelColors = new int[1]; itemDef.originalModelColors = new int[1]; itemDef.actions[1] = "Wield"; itemDef.modelID = 5412; itemDef.maleEquip1 = 5409; itemDef.femaleEquip1 = 5409; itemDef.modelZoom = 840; itemDef.modelRotation1 = 280; itemDef.modelRotation2 = 0; itemDef.modelOffset1 = -2; itemDef.modelOffset2 = 56; itemDef.anInt204 = 0; itemDef.name = "Lime Whip"; itemDef.description = "A Lime Abyssal Whip".getBytes(); itemDef.modifiedModelColors[0] = 17350; itemDef.originalModelColors[0] = 528; }

then add the codes for your customs you want to add.
